Go Back Review Name: Just wow! Review Description: I was bit confused by reading the negative reviews related to LG technicians who comes for installation. I was totally confused if i need to buy this product or any other brand. But for my surprise the technicians who came for installation was very efficient and friendly. Has completed every thing in time and has explained the usage of the ac very well. I appreciate the same. Ac also working efficiently till now. will update the performance after a usage of two months.
